job.title: Lead/Senior Fullstack Software Engineer
job.description: pCvent is an exciting fastgrowing tech company that provides industryleading software to more than 300000 event professionals and hoteliers around the world The economic significance of our industry is undeniable Meetings and events boost the global GDP by more than 15 trillion and impact nearly 26 million jobs and for more than 20 years Cvent has led the transformation of our industry with our marketleading technologyppnbspppSenior Software Engineers are responsible for the design and development of the suite of cloudbased software products utilizing cuttingedge tools and
